title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid inputs and receive a confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill in valid user details and select a role (SweatPro/SweatTeamMember/SweatAthlete).
Submit the registration form.
Verify the user is registered, receives confirmation, and is redirected to the onboarding wizard.

title: User Registration Input Validation
description: Check input validation and error handling when registering with invalid or missing fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Attempt to submit empty registration form.
Ensure error messages appear for required fields.
Enter invalid email and weak password, then attempt to submit.
Ensure proper validation errors for email format and password complexity.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check login is successful and JWT token is issued with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid registered username/email and password.
Click login button.
Verify login success, JWT token is stored, and user is redirected to role-based dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid username/email or password and proper error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input incorrect username/email or password.
Click login button.
Verify login failure and appropriate error is displayed without issuing token.

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Validate the password recovery process works end-to-end including reset email and password update.

steps.description: Navigate to password recovery page.
Submit registered email for password reset.
Verify reset email is sent.
Follow reset link and enter new valid password.
Confirm password is updated and user can login with new password.

title: SweatSheet Creation and Validation
description: Verify that SweatPros can create and save personalized SweatSheets with exercises, media attachments, and validations.

steps.description: Login as SweatPro, navigate to SweatSheet creation page.
Add a new SweatSheet with a title, description, and multiple exercises using drag-and-drop.
Attach media files (images/videos) to exercises.
Save the SweatSheet.
Verify SweatSheet is created, saved correctly, and all media attachments are accessible.

title: SweatSheet Assignment and Access
description: Verify that assigned SweatSheets are accessible and trackable by assigned SweatAthletes.

steps.description: Login as SweatPro and assign an existing SweatSheet to a SweatAthlete.
Confirm assignment notification is sent to the athlete.
Login as the assigned SweatAthlete and access the assigned SweatSheet.
Verify full access to the SweatSheet, progress tracking, and ability to mark exercises as complete.

title: Prevent SweatSheet Access by Unassigned Users
description: Ensure that SweatSheets are not accessible to users who are not assigned to them.

steps.description: Login as a SweatAthlete who has not been assigned a particular SweatSheet.
Attempt to access the unassigned SweatSheet via direct URL.
Verify access is denied and appropriate error or redirection occurs.

title: Trainer Availability Display in Calendar
description: Verify that trainer availabilities are correctly displayed in the booking calendar for athletes.

steps.description: Login as a trainer and set availability on the calendar.
Login as a SweatAthlete and navigate to booking calendar.
Validate that trainer's available time slots appear accurately.

title: Session Booking Workflow
description: Test athlete booking flow including selecting time slot, booking confirmation, calendar sync, and automated reminders.

steps.description: Login as SweatAthlete and select an available trainer time slot.
Submit session booking request.
Confirm booking success message, calendar event sync, and receipt of automated reminder notification.

title: Booking Conflict Prevention
description: Verify that booking system prevents double booking and conflicts with existing sessions.

steps.description: Create a booking for a trainerâ€™s time slot as one athlete.
Attempt to book the same time slot by another athlete.
Ensure booking is declined with a conflict error.

title: Session Cancellation and Notification
description: Verify that athletes and trainers can cancel sessions and that cancellations trigger appropriate notifications.

steps.description: Login as athlete or trainer and cancel a booked session.
Confirm cancellation confirmation, calendar update, and notification sent to other party.

title: Real-Time Messaging Delivery & Notifications
description: Verify real-time delivery of 1:1 and group messages including push and email notifications.

steps.description: Login as two different users in separate sessions.
Send a private message from one user to the other.
Verify immediate message receipt and notification appearance.
Create a group chat and send a group message.
Ensure all group members receive the message and notifications.

title: Messaging Error Handling
description: Test messaging system responds gracefully to network disconnections and server errors.

steps.description: Simulate network loss during message send.
Confirm appropriate error message and retry capability.
Simulate server-side failure during message delivery.
Verify user is notified of failure and message is not lost.

title: Secure Payment Processing - Success Flow
description: Verify exercise packages and shop items can be purchased securely using multiple payment methods with success confirmation.

steps.description: Login as any user and navigate to shop.
Add package or item to cart and proceed to payment.
Complete payment using supported payment method.
Verify payment success notification, receipt generation, and update in user payment dashboard.

title: Secure Payment Processing - Failure Scenarios
description: Test payment processing handles declined cards, network errors, and validation failures gracefully.

steps.description: Attempt payment with invalid card details.
Verify appropriate error message is displayed and user can retry.
Simulate payment gateway downtime.
Verify system displays payment unavailable message and does not lose cart data.

title: Shop Product Listing and Inventory Management
description: Verify all shop products are listed correctly with stock levels and that inventory decrements upon purchase.

steps.description: Navigate to the shop page.
Verify product details, images, prices, and availability status are displayed accurately.
Purchase a product.
Verify inventory count is decreased accordingly.

title: Responsive UI on Multiple Devices
description: Confirm that the application UI renders correctly and is fully functional on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with responsive navigation and layout.

steps.description: Open application on desktop browser.
Verify UI layout, navigation menus, and functionality work as expected.
Open application on tablet device/browser emulator.
Verify responsive layout and UI elements adapt properly.
Open application on mobile device/browser emulator.
Confirm touch interactions, layout adjustments, and navigation usability.

title: Theme Toggle Dark/Light Mode Persistence
description: Verify UI theme toggle works smoothly with transitions and persists user preference across sessions.

steps.description: Toggle theme from light to dark mode.
Verify UI switches theme with smooth transition.
Log out and log in again.
Confirm previously selected theme persists correctly.

title: Access Control with JWT Protected Routes
description: Validate endpoint and route access based on user roles and that JWT tokens protect resources from unauthorized access.

steps.description: Login as each role (SweatPro, SweatTeamMember, SweatAthlete).
Attempt to access role-specific protected routes and protected APIs.
Verify access is granted appropriately and all unauthorized attempts are blocked.
Attempt to access protected routes without JWT token or with invalid token.
Confirm system denies access and redirects to login.

title: Loading Indicators and UI State Error Handling
description: Confirm the presence and correctness of loading states and error messages during asynchronous operations.

steps.description: Trigger asynchronous data loading (e.g., fetching SweatSheets, messages, shop products).
Verify loading indicators are shown during data fetch.
Simulate API failure during data loading.
Verify error handling UI appears with retry options.

title: Google Analytics 4 Event Tracking
description: Verify key user actions trigger correct event tracking calls to Google Analytics 4.

steps.description: Perform critical actions such as login, SweatSheet creation, booking session, messaging, and purchase.
Check that corresponding GA4 events are sent with accurate parameters.

title: System Performance Under Load
description: Validate application maintains uptime above 99.9% and average page load times under 2 seconds under typical usage scenarios.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent users performing normal operations in test environment.
Monitor uptime metrics and page load times to ensure compliance with targets.
